attributes.review:
so i downloaded this app on my phone 📲 and when i went on it i IMMEDIATELY WENT IN A COMA, yes a COMA FOR 17 years!!!!! because i saw a UNBELIEVABLY WEIRD DEFORMED ORANGE CREATURE??? then i realized, oh😱 thats just mr trumpet😅my bad 😹whoops! but, THEN IT ASKED FOR MY phone NUMBER? im sorry mr trmipet orange🖐 i am not giving my phone number📱to a orange orangutan🍊 BUT THEN, THE MORE TIME I SPENT ON THE APP, I FELT DIZZY, THEN WEIRD NOISES CAME FROM THE APP?? AND THAT NOISE MADE MY HOUSE FLOOD WITH COCKOARACHES!!!!! LIKE O 🦷EM🙄GEE🙀 AND NOW, here I AM , ROOMING WITH A BUNCH OF COCKORACHES? THEN, TTHE COCKOARXAHES INVITED ITS FRIENDS, RATS OVER AND NOW HERE I AM, LIVING WITH A BUNCH OF RODENTS AND BUGS IN MY HOUSE!!!! ALL BECAUSE OF THIS APP!!! TAKE THIS DOWN NOW.PARENTS, IT IS NOT SAFE FOR YOUR KIDS!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU WANT TO GO IN A COMMA, OR U WANT TO ATTRACT BUGS AND INSECTS INTO UR HOUSE!!! OH, IT MIGHT ALSO ATTRACT MONKEYS, BECAUSE THE MONKEYS MIGHT MISTAKEN MR TRUMPET AS THEIR ANCESTORS! I AM WARNING YOU NOW, PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!1!1!1😠😤🤯🤬
👅making😽my💋way💃🏻downtown🕺🏻
attributes.title: NOT GOOD FOR YOUR HEALTH!!!

attributes.review:
do not, i repeat, do not download this trash bag poorly written outdated code app. it offers no information about our amazing presidents upcoming campaign, and instead stole all
of the data off of my phone and opened my phone to vulnerabilities and caused me to get hacked and a phone virus by someone from russia because i kept getting these russian pop up windows with explicit photographs. do NOT DOWNLOAD if you value your information, privacy, and, above all, ever-loving american freedom. gd bless.
attributes.title: DO. NOT. DOWNLOAD.

attributes.review: It took 2 YEARS TO DOWNLOAD OMFG. it’s terrible and needs to be removed from the app store immediately. I think it summoned a ghost in my house because I keep seeing MAGA written on my walls... this is serious guys do not get this app for YOUR OWN SAFTEY YOUR HOUSE WILL BE HAUNTED. Apple please I am begging you to remove this app from the app store PEASE for the safety of everyone.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE HOLY SHT

attributes.review: I got this app with high hopes of it being good, but it took forever to download ,it works to slow, and it constantly lags\freezes.Its ridiculous and would 100% would NOT recommend.
attributes.title: Terrible,works slow,Took forever to download.

attributes.review: Bernie for President 🤍 @PelodeElotes you did America dirty
attributes.title: America was NOT MADE GREAT 😌

attributes.review: Wish I could give 0 stars. Tried to open the app and didn’t even work, had to re-download. Once it finally opened it glitched like crazy. Bottom line this is ass, might as well just take it off the App Store 🖐🏼🖐🏼
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: This app has to be the worst made ever! First, it took absolutely forever to download, forever. How am I supposed to support my tiny handed hot Cheeto? And then second the app kept crashing over and over again when I tried to turn it on. Not to mention the amount of “inappropriate” pics I saw for the first couple of seconds. I don’t understand what this app was trying to go for, but this was not what I expected. Trump is a crybaby and it shows through the entire app with his fits and baby bottle up his ass.
attributes.title: I can’t believe this!

attributes.review: THIS APP RESTED MY PHONE AND ON TOP OF THAT TRYING TO DOWNLOAD THIS ADD WAS A PAIN IN THE ASS. I EXPECTED MORE FROM THIS APP. ALSO I KNOW THE GOVERNMENT IS WATCHING US ON THIS APP. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT WILL HACK UR PHONE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: DO NOT AND I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app is scary, I opened it after it took a day to download and it immediately asked for my location.  I usually support my amazing president trump in all his glorious weaves, but with his 30+ rape allegations coming to light I don’t feel comfortable as a woman to know he is tracking my location.  Don’t get me wrong I still love my dear Mr. Trump.  But a part of me wonders how true some things are.
attributes.title: Scary and DANGEROUS
